thread.title: DJI launches Osmo, an iPhone-connected 4K steadicam for $650
thread.title_full: DJI launches Osmo, an iPhone-connected 4K steadicam for $650

title: DJI launches Osmo, an iPhone-connected 4K steadicam for $650
text:
DJI launches Osmo, an iPhone-connected 4K steadicam for $650 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
DJI on Thursday unveiled the Osmo, an integrated 4K camera and handheld three-axis stabilizer that connects to Apple's iPhone for even great...
